description.full: Neon Alley is a 24/7 channel of ALL English dubbed, UNCUT, anime & more including weekly exclusive premieres of hit series and 1st time dubs along with classic kung fu, anime inspired live action movies & more! Catch premiere episodes of NARUTO Shippuden, Blue Exorcist & Tiger & Bunny plus favorites like InuYasha, One Piece, and Death Note all together only in one place - only on Neon Alley. Download the app and start your 1 WEEK FREE TRIAL now!
